show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
A most important interview! How do SSRI antidepressants given to a pregnant mother impact on her, on her unborn child, on her newborn child, on her nursing infant,  and even on her grown adult offspring?
  Do they cause autism?
Adult sexual dysfunction?
 Adam Urato, MD shares enormous wisdom.
experience, and scientific knowledge about an escalating tragedy.
